meanings.definition: The act of breaking the law.
meanings.sent1: The lawbreakings in the city have increased recently.
meanings.sent2: He was arrested for his lawbreakings last night.
meanings.sent3: The lawbreakings at the party were so obvious, even the pets noticed.
meanings.sent4: Her reckless driving was a constant stream of lawbreakings.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of his lawbreakings caught up with him sooner than he expected.

meanings.sent1: The police are searching for the lawbreakings who stole the car.
meanings.sent2: She was known in the neighborhood as a notorious lawbreakings.
meanings.sent3: The lawbreakings tried to hide in a funny costume but was still caught.
meanings.sent4: The lawbreakings was a shadowy figure in the night, always one step ahead.
meanings.sent5: The community worked together to catch the lawbreakings red-handed.
